sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: By default Portal main menu has 4 items: Processes, Tasks, Cases and Statistics. You can remove these items or add your own items.

sect2.title: Customization
sect2.para:
In your project, override the process LoadSubMenuItems in PortalTemplate and follow the hints.
User can hide Statistic widget in . Therefore, if you want to hide Statistic widget in your overrided process, please take a look on NOTE section of LoadSubMenuItems in PortalTemplate.
